thread.title: Music director Ravindra Jain hospitalised in Mumbai, condition stable - newsR
thread.title_full: Music director Ravindra Jain hospitalised in Mumbai, condition stable - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Music director Ravindra Jain hospitalised in Mumbai, condition stable - newsR
text:
Veteran music director Ravindra Jain has been admitted to Lilavati Hospital in Bandra, Mumbai following ill-health, where his condition is said to be stable.
The 71-year-old music composer is suffering from a urinary infection causing a problem in his kidney, sources said.*Ravindra Jain*
Ravindra Jain was shifted from ... Â»
